title: z Systems Architect Manager - West Region - USA-AZ-Phoenix
text: z Systems Architect Manager - West RegionJob ID S_D-0798246   - Any (AZ),AZ, - Any (CA),CA, - Any (CO),CO, - Any (NV),NV, - Any (WA),WA Posted 25-Sep-2015Travel 50%   Sys SWS ESC Job role Client Technical Manager Job role skillset SYS Z.Cross Brand.Leadership-MAJCommissionable/Sales-  descriptionThe z Systems Architect Manager's role is to grow Systems Unit revenue by influencing customers to deploy new applications on the platform and to protect customer z System investment. The Architect Manager accomplishes their role by leading a team of sales focused architects for clients across a defined geography. This role further includes leading Business Analytic Technical Sellers in addition to Architects.Clients represent existing, as well as new to the z Systems platform companies. The candidate for this position will have architecture experience along with knowledge of the z Systems, including understanding IBM software solutions for z. The candidate will lead and guide technical sales architects and Business Analytic Technical Sellers to build relationships with clients lines of business, application development, and architecture teams. Through z Systems Architect Manager team leadership, they will educate clients on the value that the z Systems platform brings to applications, new development in Mobile, Cloud, Business Analytic, and Security; as well as help clients compare and contrast application deployments on z Systems versus (or in concert with other available platforms). This role will work across clients in their territory, and will collaborate with numerous IBM based teams to accomplish their role, including Client Relationship teams, Sales teams in IBM Units for Business Analytic, Cloud, Social, Security and Services.This role is a sales based role and supports clients in multiple industries including one or more of the following: Financial Markets, Banking, Transportation, Healthcare, Government, or Insurance.Additional Responsibilities Include:Provide technical consultation and education to their team of architects, and our sales team specific to new offering informationCollaborate with technical resources in the development and closure of sales opportunitiesKey Attributes:Ability to sell solutions to various client architect, technical, business and executive audiencesDemonstrated organizational skills, discipline, with attention to detail and ability to manage individuals with full Human Resource responsibilities, as well as balance multiple tasksDemonstrated problem-solving ability, analytical skills, and business judgmentRequired   working with zSystems * At least 3   sales or sales management * Readiness to travel 50%   Fluent
